description: Details of equipment to control emission of fumes and smells from the ground floor A3/A5 unit pursuant to condition 7(i)(b) of application ref: PP/2012/1925 dated 13/07/2012 for variation of condition 7(i) (refuse & recycling facilities, biomass boiler, floor/ceiling insulation and rainwater harvesting systems only, equipment to control emission of fumes and smells from the ground floor A3/A5 unit) of planning permission Ref: PP/2010/1961 dated 23/09/2010 (allowed on appeal Ref: APP/A5270/A/11/2149773 dated 25/10/2011), for Internal and external alterations, including the installation of a new shop front and front entrance to access the upper floors of 50-54, construction of first and second floor rear extensions, creation of a third floor within the roof space and third floor rear extension, mansard extension to the front roofslope and the formation of 1st, 2nd and 3rd floor terraces in conjunction with the formation of a ground floor A3/A5 unit and 17 Apartment/Hotel (apart-hotel) units, with associated ground floor cycle parking, refuse storage and disabled parking space to the rear (part retrospective application)
